Articles.Content:
Last September I watched Nerd Cubed on youtube play KSP. After less than 2 minutes KSP was purchased and I began playing little did I know where this was leading...

After playing for a while and then discovering the mods I started fiddling with other peoples parts trying to get them to do what I wanted or sometimes even to work correctly.

This has now degenerated into making my own parts - a wide selection is planned of parts from me and parts to complement other mods.

One thing has bugged me from day one of playing WHY AREN'T JEB BILL AND BOB WEARING ORANGE SPACE SUITS like in the loading screen? I know the answer is because all real spacesuits are white but I wanted orange just like the loading screen!

SO... I made them orange with help from Texture replacer, pimp my kerbal and a lot of effort.

My own custom textures for Bill Bob and Jeb complete with names on helmets

Hi Green Skull. I like to play stock-only, but there are a few things like this which tempt me to go over to the dark side.

Welcome to the forum.

Edited March 3, 2014 by Vanamonde
Welcome aboard! I like your work. I'm sure you'll go far!
Thank you both. More of a re-colouring that a new texture map though.
